Name: El Vestido
Ingredients: 45 ml Bacardi Carta Blanca Superior White Rum
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: DRY SHAKE (without ice) first 5 ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. Add mint leaves, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.# Special ingredient #1 : Homemade raspberry syrup (1:1)
History: UAE Bacard√≠ Legacy 2015 winning cocktail by Eric Ballard at Provocateur in Dubai, UAE.
